CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(amc__Status__c, "Complete"), 1, IF( OR(amc__Total_Hours_Scheduled__c == 0, amc__Total_Hours_Completed__c == 0), (amc__Complete_Actions__c / amc__Total_Actions__c) , (amc__Total_Hours_Completed__c / (amc__Total_Hours_Completed__c + amc__Total_Projected_Hours_Remaining__c))
))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Status = Complete, will display 100%. If Total Hours Scheduled or Total Hours Completed = 0 will be Completed Actions / Total Actions, otherwise Total Hours Completed / (Total Hours Completed + Total Projected Hours Remaining)
CustomField.label: Phase Completion Status
